etomica.liquidLJ

Class MeterPotentialEnergyCutoff

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.liquidLJ.MeterPotentialEnergyCutoff
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDataSource, IEtomicaDataSource

    public class MeterPotentialEnergyCutoff
extends java.lang.Object
implements IEtomicaDataSource
    Meter for evaluation of the potential energy in a box. Includes several related methods for computing the potential energy of a single atom or molecule with all neighboring atoms
